body:
Whoa, pressing Random kind of paid off
I enjoyed the hentai adaptation of this. 
God it's been too long

There is already an Anime adaption for this one, 2 epsiodes, each 20 minutes, and even that one is already translated. Wtf? I don't get it. The anime adaptions come out after the manga, but they get the translations faster.
there are no scat scenes ... wrong tagging ..
Is it a trap? Theres this beautiful cover but a scat tag. Shall I risk it?
